subject: Add tutorial step explaining notifications before permission request
body:
Added new "Stay Connected" step (step 8) to the tutorial that explains:
- What notifications do (alert when messages arrive)
- Why they matter for asynchronous messaging
- Platform differences (mobile vs web)
- Sets expectation for upcoming permission request

This ensures users understand the value of notifications before being prompted, improving onboarding UX.

Updated CLAUDE.md to reflect 9-step tutorial structure.
title: Add tutorial step explaining notifications before permission request
